Buffalo saddle

  • Tree: 16" Bowden Association
  • Horn: Rawhide Wrap #4 Dally
  • Cantle: 4" with Cheyenne Roll
  • Skirting: Round
  • Fender: Regular
  • Stirrup: Full Leather Wrap, 2" Visalia
  • Rigging: Flat Plate with Rear D-Ring
  • Tooling: Custom Buffalo with Running W-Border
